products.title: Sio Merino Navy Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their sio collection intruduces stylish modern patterns to your window dressing. Their sio meriono navy will make a chic addition to your home. Pair with dark wooden tones throughout the home for a look that can not be surpassed. The polyester fabric is decorative whilst providing a sleek and practical window covering. Product id: sdb-pfr0488 fabric colour: merino navy material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes sio merino navy perfect fit roller blind in blue.
